General.Name: Qingdao East Steel Tower Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao East Steel Tower Stock Co.Ltd manufactures and markets steel structure products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers power steel structures, towering radio and television transmission towers, power transmission and transformation towers, steel pipe towers, wind power equipment, clean energy, petrochemicals, marine engineering equipment, high-end civil construction equipment, and public steel structure buildings used in the fields of petrochemical, electric power, radio and television, communication, building steel structure, municipal, and other. It also operates in potash fertilizer industry. Qingdao East Steel Tower Stock Co.Ltd was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jiaozhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 318, Guangzhou North Road, Jiaozhou, China, 266300
